Keywords: Future , Past , Soldier , Warrior , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Nathan Summers
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering, Characters
BODYSLIDE BY...: Phasing/Teleport, Passenger: 2. // FREE: If Cable has two action tokens, Move.
MOM! IS IT COOL IF I TRADE WITH RAZA?: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // FREE: Choose a character within range and line of fire and a standard attack power they can use. Until your next turn, Cable can use the chosen power and the chosen character can't use that power.
I GAVE THEM A GIFT... ONE OF MY FAVORITE GRENADES: Enhancement. // POWER: Make a range attack, and all other characters adjacent to the original target also become targets. Hit characters are dealt 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage and modify attack -2 until your next turn.
